request.description:
Comprehensive Analysis and Testing of WorkoutLogger Component

## Objective
Perform full-stack analysis and E2E testing of the WorkoutLogger feature to verify recent fixes and ensure production readiness.

## Context from Screenshot
- WorkoutLogger in Athlete Mode showing 'Quick Workout - Dec 06'
- 86% completion (6 of 7 sets completed)
- Exercise 1: Pogo's - Complete with '15 contacts'
- Exercise 2: Straight Leg Bounds - 'Target: 3 reps × 20m @ RPE 7-8 @ 80% intensity'
- PROGRAMMED TARGET correctly showing '3 reps× 20 m'
- Form fields: 'Actual Reps' (3), 'Actual Distance (m)' (empty)

## Recent Fixes to Verify
1. Data-based metric detection (contacts vs reps+distance)
2. Backend getEffectiveTargetReps() helper function
3. Frontend getLoggingCategoryConfig() with programmedData parameter
4. Dynamic duration labels (hold vs intervals)
5. Heart rate fields pipeline (heartRateRange, percentHeartRateMax)
6. Date navigation with active workout sessions

## Analysis Scope
- Backend: convex/workoutLogsModules/ (helpers.ts, mutations.ts, queries.ts)
- Frontend: src/components/WorkoutLoggerModules/
- Config: src/config/exerciseFields/logging/
- Types: convex/types/workoutTypes.ts, frontend types.ts

## Testing Scope
- Plyometric exercises (contacts-based: Pogo's)
- Plyometric exercises (reps+distance: Straight Leg Bounds)
- Sprint exercises (reps+distance: Fly Sprints)
- Isometric exercises (duration: Calf Iso Hold)
- Date navigation behavior
- Set completion and workout progress
